title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Moral Analysis of Islamic Bank Credit Card Repayment Using Data Mining

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Key variables influencing the moral behavior of Indonesian Islamic bank customers in repaying credit card debts can be identified using data mining techniques.
Machine learning models (e.g., Random Forest, XGBoost) can be utilized to predict and interpret factors influencing moral repayment decisions
Spatial clustering analysis enables visualization and strategic explanation of regional differences in repayment patterns

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
